content.body: Great, thanks! I'm hosting a Tomcat web server and I need it to send  "Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy" "Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy" headers in the response. The documentation on how to configure Tomcat's web.xml references [this specification](https://fetch.spec.whatwg.org/) (I got here by clicking the chat link ðŸ˜€) which includes those headers. but the documentation doesn't tell me how to actually implement those headers in the web.xml.
